department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: A procurement contract in the region of Ontario (except NCR), Quebec (except NCR), and British Columbia for supply of Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil for Govt. Departments, Supply of the goods is on a fixed term basis for Delivery Date: From November 1, 2022 to August 31, 2023.
full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement**
### DIESEL FUEL, AUTOMOTIVE GASOLINE, AND HEATING FUEL OIL TENDER

**Reference Number:** PW-__HL-636-81395
**Solicitation Number:** E60HL-210020/I
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-22

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-19 (14:00:00 CDT)

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** CETA, WTO-AGP, CPTPP, CFTA, FTA with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and UK

**Procurement Overview:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards.

**Delivery Locations:** Ontario (except NCR), Quebec (except NCR), and British Columbia.

**Delivery Period:** November 1, 2022 to August 31, 2023.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Tender Status:** Expiration

**Documents and Attachments:**
Documents and bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

*   [**Attachment 1:** Whole Tender is attached as a single PDF file. The file contains multiple attachments and can be accessed by only by clickign the link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/20/73f280bfe8f451b2f47ff6482e9a45d2/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B636.E81395.EBSU000.PDF)
*   [**Attachment 2:** Additional documents in a zip file](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/4305c5b48e092fd6dcb6d06478bad64d/1-0020-i_-_rfso_-_app_a.zip)

    **Contact Information:**
To inquire about this solicitation, please contact:

 Lacelle, Ann (Ann.Lacelle@t PSGC-p GSC.gc.ca)
613) 296-3977 (    )

140 O'Connor Street,
East Tower, 4th floor
